question: You are migrating 40TB of data into S3, but you also need to process the data before transferring it to S3. Which service should you use?

answers.A: Use Snowball Edge to process and transport the data
answers.B: Process the data locally and use Snowball Edge to transport the data
answers.C: Process the data locally and use Snowball to transport the data
answers.D: Use Snowball to transfer the data to S3, then process the data using a Lambda function
